CodeBlockMethod.Name: Swap
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if self.count < 1 then self.count = 5 self.Photo4.Enable = false self.Text4.Enable = false self.Photo5.Enable = true self.Text5.Enable = true self.Photo1.Enable = false self.Text1.Enable = false self.Page_num.TextComponent.Text = string.format("5 / 5 페이지") end
if self.count > 5 then self.count = 1 self.Photo1.Enable = true self.Text1.Enable = true self.Photo2.Enable = false self.Text2.Enable = false self.Photo5.Enable = false self.Text5.Enable = false self.Page_num.TextComponent.Text = string.format("1 / 5\n페이지") end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.Photo1.Enable = true self.Text1.Enable = true self.Page_num.TextComponent.Text = string.format("1 / 5\n페이지")

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if Entity == self.Next then self.count = self.count + 1 self:Swap() elseif Entity == self.Before then self.count = self.count - 1 self:Swap() end
if self.count == 1 then self.Photo1.Enable = true self.Text1.Enable = true self.Photo2.Enable = false self.Text2.Enable = false self.Photo5.Enable = false self.Text5.Enable = false self.Page_num.TextComponent.Text = string.format("1 / 5\n페이지") elseif self.count == 2 then self.Photo1.Enable = false self.Text1.Enable = false self.Photo2.Enable = true self.Text2.Enable = true self.Photo3.Enable = false self.Text3.Enable = false self.Page_num.TextComponent.Text = string.format("2 / 5 페이지") elseif self.count == 3 then self.Photo2.Enable = false self.Text2.Enable = false self.Photo3.Enable = true self.Text3.Enable = true self.Photo4.Enable = false self.Text4.Enable = false self.Page_num.TextComponent.Text = string.format("3 / 5 페이지") elseif self.count == 4 then self.Photo3.Enable = false self.Text3.Enable = false self.Photo4.Enable = true self.Text4.Enable = true self.Photo5.Enable = false self.Text5.Enable = false self.Page_num.TextComponent.Text = string.format("4 / 5 페이지") elseif self.count == 5 then self.Photo4.Enable = false self.Text4.Enable = false self.Photo5.Enable = true self.Text5.Enable = true self.Photo1.Enable = false self.Text1.Enable = false self.Page_num.TextComponent.Text = string.format("5 / 5 페이지") end
